note.p: Birth: Adelaide, South Australia, Australia (22 May 1866)
Education: DSc (University of Adelaide); University College, London
Career: Professor of Physics, Canterbury College College, New Zealand; Fellow and Hector Medallist, New Zealand Institute
Obituaries: Obituary Notices of Fellows of the Royal Society 1942-1944 vol 4 pp 503-506, plate, by Kerr Grant
References: Robin J H Clark and Michael J Kelly, 'New Zealand, New Zealanders and the Royal Society' in NR 1994 vol 48 pp 263-281
